title: InSituASProfile
text: step cleans data frame 1) omitting acceleration values 0, 2) identify two highest acceleration values every consecutive 0.2 m/s cut starting 3 m/s, 3) create initial regression line associated preliminary plot (FALSE)

title: InSituASProfile
text: Calculate -S Profile. step uses data exported prepare_data, calculate -S Profile. plots -S Profile default (TRUE), plot showing regression line printed default (FALSE).

title: In-situ sprint acceleration-speed profile
text: goal InSituASProfile provide easy way calculate insitu sprint acceleration-speed profile based gps data using method described Morin et al. 2021 published Journal Biomechanics, DOI: 10.1016/j.jbiomech.2021.110524

title: In-situ sprint acceleration-speed profile

title: Prepare data — prepare_data
text: Prepares dataframe provide preliminary analysis

title: Prepare data — prepare_data
text: x dataframe two numeric columns named "speed" "acc". speed values m/s. print_plot logical control preliminary plot printed, default TRUE

title: Prepare data — prepare_data
text: function prepares input dataframe : filtering acc >= 0, filtering speed >= 3, creating speed bins 0.2, indentifying highest two acc values speed bin. function outputs initial linear regression analysis associated scatterplot initial data inspection.
